document_data.name: Turtle soup
document_data.mainbody: '''Turtle soup''' was a type of soup in the Realms whose preparation involved the meat of a [[turtle]].

Notable Users.Businesses:
* The [[Maided of the Moor]] in [[Mornbryn's Shield]] was known to serve this dish.
* In the port city of [[Neverwinter]], both the [[Fallen Tower]] and [[Moonstone Mask]] were known to serve this dish.
* The [[Singing Sword]] tavern in [[Waterdeep]] was well known for serving turtle soup on a daily basis within upside-down turtle shells.
Notable Users.Individuals: * [[Alustriel Silverhand]] had such a great fondness for this dish that she created the [[turtle soup (spell)|''turtle soup'']] [[spell]] so that she could always have some on hand.{{Cite web/theedverse/2021-10-17 - Alustriel and Turtle Soup}} Though the rest of the [[Seven Sisters]] did not share her fondness for the dish.
Notable Users.Races & Sentient Creatures: * Turtle soup was a common dish in [[Elf|Elven]] cuisine.<ref>
